mapper.select: select a.user_code userCode, a.order_code orderCode, a.goods_code goodsCode, b.goods_name goodsName, a.buy_num buyNum, a.total_num totalNum, b.selling_price sellingPrice, b.fix_price fixPrice from t_order_detail a, t_sys_goods b where a.goods_code = b.goods_code and a.order_code = #{orderCode} and a.is_delete = 0

select a.order_code orderCode, a.order_amount orderAmount, a.order_state orderState, a.store_id storeId, b.user_name userName, b.phone phone, a.create_time orderTime from t_sys_order a, t_sys_user b where a.create_id = b.user_code and a.is_delete = 0
and b.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and a.order_code like concat('%', #{orderCode}, '%')
and b.phone like concat('%', #{phone}, '%')
and a.order_state = #{orderState}
and a.create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#{payTimeBegin},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and a.create_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{payTimeEnd},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and b.user_code in (select t1.user_code from t_sys_customer t1, t_sys_store t2 where t1.invite_code = t2.invite_code and t2.user_code = #{userId} and t1.is_delete = 0)
order by a.create_time
